resources.string: The Passwords entered do not match.
Please Select the form you would like to fill out
Form H123B For Passenger Metal Detectors
Form H124B For Baggage Metal Detectors
Please Select the Form you wish to look at

string-array.name: Forms_Array
string-array.item: Form H123B For Passenger Metal Detectors
Form H124B For Baggage Metal Detectors

string-array.name: Form_H123B
string-array.item: This form is to be completed daily
Question 2) Is the machine working properly?
Question 3) Does the machine properly pick up metallic threats?
Question 4) Does the machine properly pick up non-metallic threats?
Question 5) Has the machine generated any false positives? If so, state in additional information down below.
Question 6) Does the machine require any maintenance in the near future?

string-array.name: Form_H124B
string-array.item: This form is to be completed daily
Question 2) Is the machine working properly?
Question 3) Does the machine properly x-ray baggage to detect threats?
Question 4) Is the EDS System operational and does it properly detect explosive threats?
Question 5) Is the bottled liquid scanners operational and does it properly detect liquid threats?
Question 6) Have any of the detection systems generated any false positives? If so, please list which system and what substance generated the trigger.
